# RStudio Desktop

We will use [RStudio](https://rstudio.com/) to learn [R](https://www.r-project.org/) programming.  

**Make sure you install R first before installing RStudio Desktop.**

* Install [R (v4.1.2)](https://cran.rstudio.com/) 
* Install [RStudio Desktop (2021.09.2+382)](https://rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/)
